name: Skool Brawl: Slaps and Dabs
description:
This game was completed in <48 hours for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2017, using the theme 'Dude 52'!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We ranked 15th overall out of 131 submissions!
https://itch.io/jam/bscotch100/rate/146950

Play full screen, ideally in any 16:9 aspect ratio (e.g. 1920x1080 or 960x540)!

Also if you read this, post your high score in the comments! My high score is 2560! :)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • MOVE with W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys
  • TAUNT new enemies with E
  • INSULT with Right Click or Q
  • SLAP with Left Click or Space Bar
  • SPECIAL ATTACK (DAB) with Shift Key (when special meter is full)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

  • Xavier Ekkel (Code) @XavierEkkel
  • Kenric D'Souza (Code) @AzureByte
  • Angela He (Art/Code) @zephybite
  • Kyle Wynn (Sound) @KyleTheWynner
  • Dustin Krefft (Music) @dkrefft

Game Engine: Unity

Team formed entirely through Reddit.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
